destination.name: Bangkok
destination.funFact: Bangkok is the capital and most populous city of Thailand. It is known in Thai as Krung Thep Maha Nakhon or simply Krung Thep.

destination.name: Phuket
destination.funFact: Phuket is a city in Thailand, formerly known as Thalang. It is the capital of Phuket Province.

destination.name: Pattaya
destination.funFact: Pattaya is a city on Thailandâ€™s eastern Gulf coast known for its beaches. A quiet fishing village as recently as the 1960s.

destination.name: Chiang Mai
destination.funFact: Chiang Mai is a city in mountainous northern Thailand. Founded in 1296, it was capital of the independent Lanna Kingdom until 1558.
